attributes.action: ensure that when Government Ministers or others in public office resign or are sacked as a result of their failings, dishonesty, misleading the public or Parliament, are immediately stripped of their occupational pension and other benefits paid for or provided for out of the public purse
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most holders of high public office benefit from healthy and protected pensions and other benefits (grace and favour houses etc).  When they "resign" or are sacked for incompetence, dishonesty, misleading the public or other misdemeanours they should forgo those benefits.  The public should not have to fund disgraced public servants.
